text: Sargocentron dorsomaculatum, also known as the spotfin squirrelfish, is a species of squirrelfish found in the western Pacific Ocean near the Ryukyu Islands, Pohnpei, Kosrae, the Caroline Islands, and Palau. It lives in shallow reefs at depths between . Like other members of its genus, it is nocturnal and seeks shelter among corals and other structures. It can reach sizes of up to SL. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Holocentridae Category:Fish described in 1979 Category:Fish of the Pacific Ocean
title: Sargocentron dorsomaculatum
